alldb.table_sql: --历史交易记录查询状态为合同起租、与合同结束的记录 select ci.id,cinfo.cust_name custname,pi.proj_id projid,t_depts.name_ projdept,t_users.realname_ projmanager, ci.contract_number contractnumber,ci.contract_status contractstatus,status.status_name contractstatusname ,sumrent.allcorpus,nvl(virent.out_list,0) overlist,virent.rent-virent.inc_rent overrent,sumrent.allrent-nvl(virent.rent,0) lastrent ,planpenalty- incomepenalty overpenalty from contract_info ci left outer join proj_info pi on ci.proj_id=pi.id left outer join t_depts on t_depts.id_=ci.proj_dept left outer join t_users on t_users.id_=ci.proj_manage left outer join base_contract_status status on ci.contract_status = status.status_code left outer join( select contract_id,sum(rent) allrent,sum(corpus) allcorpus from contract_fund_rent_plan group by contract_id ) sumrent on sumrent.contract_id=ci.id left outer join cust_info cinfo on cinfo.id=ci.cust_id left outer join vi_contract_out_list virent on virent.contract_id=ci.id left outer join (select contract_id, sum(plan_penalty) planpenalty,sum(income_penalty)incomepenalty from vi_contract_penalty group by contract_id )vipenalty on vipenalty.contract_id=ci.id where (ci.contract_status = '31' or ci.contract_status = '103') /~custid: and ci.cust_id= '{custid}'~/ union all select '-','-' ,'合计','-','-','-',0,'-',sum(allcorpus),nvl(sum(overlist),0),sum(overrent) ,sum(lastrent),sum(overpenalty) from ( select ci.id,cinfo.cust_name,pi.proj_id,t_depts.name_ projdept,t_users.realname_ projmanger, ci.contract_number contractnumber,ci.contract_status contractstatus,status.status_name contractstatusname ,sumrent.allcorpus,virent.out_list overlist,virent.rent-virent.inc_rent overrent,sumrent.allrent-nvl(virent.rent,0) lastrent ,planpenalty- incomepenalty overpenalty from contract_info ci left outer join proj_info pi on ci.proj_id=pi.id left outer join t_depts on t_depts.id_=ci.proj_dept left outer join t_users on t_users.id_=ci.proj_manage left outer join base_contract_status status on ci.contract_status = status.status_code left outer join( select contract_id,sum(rent) allrent,sum(corpus) allcorpus from contract_fund_rent_plan group by contract_id) sumrent on sumrent.contract_id=ci.id left outer join cust_info cinfo on cinfo.id=ci.cust_id left outer join vi_contract_out_list virent on virent.contract_id=ci.id left outer join (select contract_id, sum(plan_penalty) planpenalty,sum(income_penalty)incomepenalty,sum(penalty) overpenalty from vi_contract_penalty group by contract_id )vipenalty on vipenalty.contract_id=ci.id where (ci.contract_status = '31' or ci.contract_status = '103') /~custid: and ci.CUST_ID = '{custid}'~/ )
